src:
Na čelu ABA lige, na dnu Evrokupa
Budućnost će pokušati da upiše prvu pobedu u Evropi protiv Unikahe (19.00)

06 Nov 2019

Slično kao i Cedevita Olimpija, Budućnost ima dva lica ove sezone. Jedno koje pokazuje u regionalnoj ABA ligi, a drugo koje smo imali priliku da gledamo u Evrokupu. I dok na Jadranu Podgoričani trenutno zauzimaju prvu poziciju na tabeli, na evropskoj sceni im baš ništa ne polazi od ruke, pa trenutno drže fenjer u Grupi D, pošto do sada nisu upisali nijednu pobedu. To će pokušati da promene protiv Unikahe na domaćem terenu večeras (TV Sport Klub 5, 19.00).
Budućnost je minulog vikenda u matine derbiju veoma ubedljivo slavila protiv Mege. Beogradski tim je uspeo da se održi u utakmici samo tokom prvih deset minuta, nakon čega su Podgoričani u potpunosti preuzeli kontrolu nad dešavanjima i slavili - 57:94.
Pre toga, ekipa iz Morače bila je izuzetno blizu da izbori pobedu protiv Oldenburga na domaćem terenu, pošto je uspela da se vrati iz velikog ponora sa početka poslednje deonice kada je gubila sa 13 poena razlike i da u jednom momentu pred kraj povede. Ipak, nemački tim je u samoj završnici bio za nijansu staloženiji i odneo je zasluženu pobedu.



Što se ekipe Unikahe tiče, reč je o jednom od glavnih favorita za osvajanje Evrokupa u tekućoj sezoni. U dosadašnjem delu grupne faze doživeli su samo jedan poraz, od Oldenburga u Nemačkoj, pa trenutno dele prvu poziciju na tabeli sa Galatasarajem.
U prvom delu grupne faze, Unikaha je relativno lako savladala Budućnost na domaćem terenu, a ključna je bila serija koju su Španci napravili sredinom druge četvrtine kada su preoteli prednost i nisu je ispuštali sve do samog kraja.
Trener Budućnosti, Petar Mijović, bez obzira na loš učinak u Evrokupu sa optimizmom gleda na naredni okršaj i smatra da je njegova ekipa od prvog meča sa Unikahom dosta napredovala.„Mi smo nakon perioda gde je dosta poraza na jednu loptu uticalo na samopouzdanje i raspoloženje, konačno odigrali jedan zreo i pametan meč u Beogradu protiv Mege, pa tako u značajno boljem raspoloženju dočekujemo Unikahu. Momci su zdravi i spremni, od povratka iz Beograda smo odradili dva treninga, a biće ih ukupno četiri do početka utakmice. Kroz trening i način na koji radimo, zaista delujemo optimistično i osećam da ekipa raste. Daleko smo od maksimuma i mislim da možemo kroz utakmice protiv velikih favorita kao što je Unikaha da napravimo kontinuitet dobrih igara“, rekao je Mijović.
Ipak, epitet favorita Mijović je prepustio španskom sastavu.„Sigurno je Unikaha favorit, ali mi ćemo uraditi sve da odigramo utakmicu na visoku nivou i na polju koncentracije i na polju energije. Pokušaćemo da iskontrolišemo defanzivni skok koji je bio na lošem nivou. Sve to bi trebalo da donese situaciju gde ćemo što je moguće duže biti u meču sa Unikahom i ako se ukaže prilika pokušati i da pobedimo“, dodao je Mijović.

EVROKUP - 6. kolo




GRUPA A



UtorakAndora - Monako 95:68/Hana 16 - Bakner 16/

text:
At the helm of the ABA League, at the bottom of Eurocup
Future will try to record first win in Europe against Unicaja (19.00)

06 Nov 2019

Similar to Cedevita Olympia, Future has two faces this season. One that shows in the regional ABA league and the other that we had the opportunity to watch in the Euro Cup. While on the Adriatic, Podgoricans currently occupy the first position in the standings, nothing really goes wrong on the European stage, so they currently hold a lantern in Group D, as they have not recorded a single win so far. They will try to make a difference against Unicaja at home tonight (TV Sport Club 5, 7pm).
The future last weekend in the matinee derby was very convincing against Mega. The Belgrade team managed to keep in the game only during the first ten minutes, after which the Podgoricans took control of the events and celebrated - 57:94.
Before that, the Moraca team was extremely close to claiming a win against Oldenburg at home, as it was able to return from the great abyss from the beginning of the last section when it lost by 13 points and at one point towards the end. Nevertheless, the German team was more nuanced in the final and took a well deserved victory.



As far as the Unicahe team is concerned, it is one of the main favorites to win the Eurocup this season. In the group stage so far, they have suffered only one defeat, from Oldenburg in Germany, and currently share the top spot with Galatasaray.
In the first part of the group stage, Unicaja was able to overcome Future in the home field relatively easily, and the key was the series made by the Spaniards in the middle of the second quarter when they took the lead and did not drop it until the very end.
The future coach, Petar Mijovic, despite his poor performance in the Eurocup, is optimistic about the next round and believes that his team has made a lot of progress since the first match with Uniqa. , finally played a mature and smart match in Belgrade against Mega, and so in a much better mood we welcome Unikah. The guys are healthy and ready, since the return from Belgrade we have done two training sessions, and there will be four of them by the start of the game. Through training and the way we work, we are really optimistic and I feel that the team is growing. We are far from the maximum and I think we can make a continuation of good games through games against big favorites such as Unicaja, "said Mijovic.
Still, he left the epithet of favorites Mijovic to the Spanish squad. "Sure, Unicaja is the favorite, but we will do our best to play the game at a high level, both in concentration and in energy. We will try to control the defensive jump which was at a bad level. All this should bring about a situation where we will be in the match with UNIKAH for as long as possible and if the opportunity arises we will try and win, "added Mijovic.

EUROPE - Round 6




GROUP A
